Articles.Content:
Hey! This is a little micro SSTO that I made... It's based around one FL-T400 fuel tank, and can take two satellites to orbit. It can also dock, if you can time everything right, and I have a two man variant. The ascent profile on this thing is pretty simple, go up until about 20KM, then level it out into a very small climb. from there, keep gaining speed...

WARNING: I HAVEN'T TESTED THIS WITHOUT FAR!

This thing works with deadly reentry too.

https://www./?8zkbnk14bby5wk1
